data.title: Bruce Willis Bio 2023: Wife, Height, Age, Zodiac Sign, Net Worth & Kids
data.meta_description: Is Bruce Willis married? Who is his wife, does he have kids, and what are his height, age, zodiac sign, and net worth in 2023?
data.meta_site_name: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
data.text:
Bruce Willis is an American actor who is best known for his roles in action films, particularly the Die Hard franchise. He has also starred in notable films such as Pulp Fiction, The Sixth Sense, and 12 Monkeys. Willis’ most recent projects include the films Fortress: Sniper’s Eye (2022) and Gasoline Alley (2022).

Here’s all you need to know about Bruce Willis, including whether or not he is married, his height, age, zodiac sign, whether or not he has kids, and his net worth in 2023.

What is Bruce Willis’s relationship status and is he married?

Bruce Willis is married. He has been married since 2009.

Willis’ previously reported partners include Demi Moore (married from 1987 to 2000), Kelly LeBrock (dated in the early 1980s), and Brooke Shields (dated in the early 1980s).

Who is Bruce Willis’s wife?

Bruce Willis is married to Emma Heming Willis. They have been married for 14 years.

Willis and Heming Willis have a close relationship and have been very supportive of each other since his aphasia diagnosis in 2022. Heming Willis has been very open about the challenges of caring for her husband, but she has also expressed her deep love and admiration for him.

Does Bruce Willis have kids?

Bruce Willis has 5 children. Their names are Rumer Willis, Scout LaRue Willis, Tallulah Belle Willis, Mabel Ray Willis and Evelyn Penn Willis.

Rumer, Scout, and Tallulah’s mother is Demi Moore, while Mabel and Evelyn are the actor’s daughters with Emma Heming Willis. While Rumer and Tallulah are actors, Scout is an accomplished musician. Not just that, Willis is a proud grandfather to Rumer’s daughter. Meanwhile, Mabel and Evelyn are still young, and they are not yet famous in their own right. However, they have been featured in the media on occasion, and they are both very popular with their dad’s fans.

What is Bruce Willis’s height and how tall is he?

Bruce Willis is reportedly 6 feet 0 inches tall.

This is considered tall for someone of his gender and age in the U.S., where the average height for males is 5’8″ and the average height for females is 5’3″.

What is Bruce Willis’s age and how old is he?

Bruce Willis is 67 years old. His birthday is March 19, 1955.

On March 19, 1955, the number one single in the U.S. music charts was “Sincerely” by The McGuire Sisters.

What is Bruce Willis’s Zodiac sign?

Bruce Willis’s Zodiac sign is Pisces.

Pisces is the twelfth and final sign of the zodiac, and it is associated with the element of water. Pisces birthdays fall between February 19th and March 20th. It is known as the sign of the dreamers and the mystics. Pisces are often very intuitive and compassionate people. They are also creative and imaginative, and they have a deep appreciation for beauty.

What is Bruce Willis’s net worth?

Bruce Willis’s net worth is reportedly around $250 million.

Willis has amassed his fortune through a successful career in acting. He has starred in some of the highest-grossing films of all time, including the Die Hard franchise, Pulp Fiction, The Sixth Sense, and 12 Monkeys. Willis has also been a successful producer and investor.
